header.title: Music Timer
top.description1: Create a playlist with a specified playback time.
top.description2: * If auto-play is enabled, songs will continue to play after the playlist ends.
top.description3: If you cannot log in, please disable "Block third-party cookies" in your browser.
auth.login.desc: Since this is a beta version, you need to apply for an account to use the app.
auth.logout.failed: Logout failed. Please try again after some time.
form.specifyTime.range: Please specify playback time between 3 and 100 minutes.
form.get.followedArtists.error:
Failed to retrieve followed artists.
Please try again after some time.
dialog.loading.title: Preparing Playlist
dialog.loading.subtitle: Searching for music...
dialog.createPlaylist.title: New Playlist
dialog.createPlaylist.not.created.title: Playlist Creation Failed
dialog.createPlaylist.not.created: Please review the conditions and try again.
dialog.createPlaylist.server.error.title: Cannot Access Server Currently
dialog.createPlaylist.server.error: Please try again after some time.
toast.playlistDeleteError:
An issue occurred while deleting the playlist.
Please try again after some time.
error.timeout: No response from the server. Please try again after some time.
error.500.description:
Currently unable to access.
Please try again after some time.
createPlaylist.followedArtistsEmpty:
You can select songs from artists you follow.
Follow artists on Spotify to see them here.
error.not_enough_tracks: Insufficient tracks. Shorten the playback time or add more artists.
error.no_favorite_tracks: No favorite tracks found. Like songs on Spotify or select artists.
error.tracks_not_found: Tracks not found. Change your conditions and try again.
error.spotify_rate_limit: Spotify API usage limit reached. Please wait a few minutes.
error.playlist_quota_exceeded: Playlist creation limit reached. Delete unnecessary playlists on Spotify.
error.token_expired: Authentication expired. Refresh the page and login again.
error.playlist_creation_failed: An unexpected error occurred. Review your conditions and try again.
error.internal_error: Server error occurred. Please try again after some time.
error.default: An error occurred. Please try again after some time.
